title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7310.2 - Definitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7310.2 - Definitions

State Regulations

As used in this Part, the following definitions shall apply
to the terms listed below: (a) Health
screening shall mean an interview and visual assessment of a youth conducted by
a facility health trained staff member which is recorded and designed to elicit
a past history or current evidence of a medical or mental health condition
requiring immediate medical or psychiatric evaluation and treatment. (b) Licensed health care professional shall
mean a physician, nurse practitioner, registered professional nurse, physician's assistant, licensed practical nurse or dentist licensed to practice
in the State of New York. (c) Medical director shall be a physician licensed to practice medicine in the

State of New York. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9

7310.2

Adopted

New

York State Register September 26, 2018/Volume XL, Issue 39, eff. 9/26/2018

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
